root: ^The porcelain doll appears before you again, its head tilted slightly.
^'I know a secret,' it whispers, its voice like cracking glass. '...if you feed me.'

c-0: ^You offer your arm. It "drinks" from your vitality. The pain is sharp but quick, leaving your mind feeling clearer, sharper. (-15 HP, +2 INT, Flag set: FED_DOLL)
c-1: ^You toss the coins at its feet. They vanish before they hit the ground, as if consumed. You feel a sudden surge of physical power. (-30 Gold, +2 STR, Flag set: FED_DOLL)
c-2: ^You've had enough. You smash the doll against the wall. A faint, terrible scream echoes in your head. (Curse: -2 STR for 3 fights)
